episodes.title: Rosemary's Words EPS 2 - Escape from the Sea Org
episodes.description:
In this episode my mom and I discuss her journey of physical recovery when she was placed in a hospice facility under the control of Scientology. She explains the process of breaking down the mind control that she was subjected to for over 35 years. We touch on the emotional escape story where myself and a few close friends rescued her (help her "blow") once she realized and accepted she was under the control of a destructive cult.
---------------------------------------------------------------------

Please consider subscribing to this channel, @MikeBrown101

episodes.description:

I am bringing you video of my mother, Rosemary Chicwak sharing her descriptions of abuse she endured prior to escape. Details that only she can explain. We will view these together and following her interview I will answer questions live.

episodes.title: My Childhood Scientology Story - Part 1
episodes.description:
Early life as a young kid thrown into the life of a Sea Org Cadet.

Mirriam Francis and Christi Gordon, both raised in Scientology, continue their Cadet Org series exploring what it was like to grow up in Scientology's Sea Organization. They discuss the psychological and physical harm they and other children suffered under this system that saw them as future assets rather than individuals. The duo are joined by Mike Brown, another survivor of Scientology's child indoctrination and exploitation who shares his traumatic experience. The journey includes personal recollections and leaked internal documents from the Cadet Org. In part one of this expansive conversation, Mike, describes his beginnings in Scientology, his home life, and how he was human trafficked as a child along with his mother, Rosemary, into signing a billion-year contract, to what she believed was a church group. Mike eventually escaped Scientology, and found a new life, career, and family, but is now bravely coming forward to share his story and advocate for other Scientology victim-survivors, including his mother, whom he rescued years later, after discovering her suffering from long-term human rights violations, elder neglect, and financial exploitation, at the hands of her so-called church.

Please subscribe to Marriam and Christi's channel: @ChildrenOfScientology 

---------------------------------------------------------------------
Mike can be contacted by email at alifetimeago101@gmail.com

Please consider subscribing to this channel, @MikeBrown101
